niagara.data_manager
Class DTDInfo

java.lang.Object
  niagara.data_manager.DTDInfo

public class DTDInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The DTDInfo class is used to associate stats and urls sets with a DTD. This is just a skelton implementation for now to define the interface. This should be much easier to use than parsing the XML doc in the Exec. Engine.
